summary: Mobile freeze bug fix verification completed. All critical z-index fixes verified working - Select/Popover/Dropdown components (z-[100]) now appear ABOVE dialogs (z-[70]). All form inputs accept typing on mobile, buttons are clickable, and no screen freezes observed. Minor issue: Admin/Supervisor roles lack visible logout button on mobile profile page.

ui_bugs.issue: No 'Cerrar Sesión' (logout) button visible on mobile profile page for Admin and Supervisor roles. Logout is only in Header dropdown which is hidden on mobile.

issues: Missing logout button on mobile - users cannot log out from profile page

guard_manual_entry_form.details: All inputs work: Name, ID, Vehicle Plate, Destination, Notes. Cancel button closes dialog. Submit button accessible.

admin_create_user_form.details: Role Select dropdown opens and shows all 5 options (Residente, Guarda, Recursos Humanos, Supervisor, Estudiante). Options are visible ABOVE dialog (z-[100] fix working). Selection works correctly.

resident_authorization_form.details: Name input works. Type Select dropdown opens with 4 options (Temporal, Permanente, Recurrente, Extendido). Selection works and form updates based on type.

resident_reservations.details: Reservations UI shows 2 areas with Reserve buttons. Reservation form opens with date picker, time inputs, guest count, and notes fields.

resident_panic_alert.details: 3 panic buttons visible and properly sized (358x68px). EMERGENCIA MÉDICA button triggers alert successfully. Shows '¡ALERTA ENVIADA!' confirmation.

guard_alert_reception.details: Guard receives panic alerts. Shows '1 ALERTA ACTIVA' with alert details from resident.

mobile_bottom_nav.details: All roles have working bottom navigation. Resident: Pánico, Visitas, Reservas, Personas, Perfil. Guard: Alertas, Check-In, Pánico, Mi Turno, Perfil. Admin: Dashboard, Usuarios, RRHH, Reservas, Perfil.

resident_logout.details: Logout button visible on profile page. Confirmation dialog appears. Successfully redirects to login page.

guard_logout.details: Logout button visible on profile page. Confirmation dialog appears. Successfully redirects to login page.

admin_logout.details: No logout button visible on Admin profile page on mobile. Logout only available in Header dropdown which is hidden on mobile viewport.

supervisor_logout.details: Same issue as Admin - no logout button on mobile profile page.

select_dropdown_z_index.details: SelectContent uses z-[100], DialogContent uses z-[70]. Dropdowns appear ABOVE dialogs correctly.

no_frozen_screens.details: No screen freezes observed. All forms responsive, inputs accept typing, buttons fire handlers.

profile_edit_flow.details: Edit button opens edit mode. Name, phone, description fields editable. Photo upload button visible. Cancel/Save buttons work.

z_index_verification.mobile_css_pointer_events: VERIFIED - pointer-events: auto on dialog inputs

action_items: Add 'Cerrar Sesión' (logout) button to ProfilePage component for Admin and Supervisor roles on mobile
Alternative: Add logout option to mobile hamburger menu sidebar for Admin/Supervisor
critical_code_review_comments: DashboardLayout.js: mobileMenuOpen state is set but no sidebar component is rendered on mobile - hamburger menu click does nothing
ProfilePage.js: Missing logout button - only EmbeddedProfile (used by Resident/Guard) has logout, not the standalone ProfilePage
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile freeze bug FIXED - z-index changes working correctly. All Select/Dropdown components appear above dialogs. Main remaining issue: Admin and Supervisor roles cannot logout on mobile because ProfilePage doesn't have logout button and hamburger menu doesn't open sidebar. Resident and Guard logout works fine via EmbeddedProfile component.
features_verified: Guard manual entry form - all inputs work ✓
Admin create user form - role Select dropdown works ✓
Resident authorization form - type Select works ✓
Mobile bottom navigation - all tabs clickable ✓
Admin logout - NOT accessible on mobile ✗
Supervisor logout - NOT accessible on mobile ✗
Select z-[100] fix - dropdowns visible above dialogs ✓
No frozen screens - all forms responsive ✓
